channel.title: CVE Feed for miniorange -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for miniorange -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23749|2024-08-04T08:42:48.211Z -- miniorange -- ldap%20integration%20with%20active%20directory%20and%20openldap%20-%20ntlm%20%26%20kerberos%20login
item.description: The 'LDAP Integration with Active Directory and OpenLDAP - NTLM & Kerberos Login' extension is vulnerable to LDAP Injection since is not properly sanitizing the 'username' POST parameter. An attacker can manipulate this paramter to dump arbitrary contents form the LDAP Database.

item.title: CVE-2023-52176|2024-08-02T22:55:40.260Z -- miniorange -- malware%20scanner
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in miniorange Malware Scanner allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Malware Scanner: from n/a through 4.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-47683|2024-06-04T17:26:43.129Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20social%20login%20and%20register%20%28discord%2C%20google%2C%20twitter%2C%20linkedin%29
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in miniOrange WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn): from n/a through 7.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-52176|2024-06-07T17:09:57.384Z -- miniorange -- malware%20scanner
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in miniorange Malware Scanner allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Malware Scanner: from n/a through 4.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-25902|2024-02-28T13:01:35.916Z -- miniorange -- malware%20scanner
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in miniorange Malware Scanner.This issue affects Malware Scanner: from n/a through 4.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-47683|2024-08-02T21:16:43.635Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20social%20login%20and%20register%20%28discord%2C%20google%2C%20twitter%2C%20linkedin%29
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in miniOrange WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn): from n/a through 7.6.6.
